Posts.Content: Feb 14, 2019 03:28PM teriholmes wrote: You should google Chabner XRT. This is a new product designed by an oncologist for woman going through radiation treatment for breast cancer. Watch the video and read about it. I was in the test group. The product is wonderful. You can wear it during the complete process and it is FDA approved. You get fitted for a bra prior to treatment and it is yours throughout the process.
Posts.Title: Bras during radiation pat01 teriholmes
